narrator.wake_up_10:
It's still dark as you wake up sweating, finally catching the air you were missing.
It takes you a moment to ground yourself and fully realize where you are.
The night is quiet and pretty cool already for the end of summer.
narrator.wake_up_20:
Thanks to your night vision, you can see that everything seems in order in the small inn room.
By your side, the cutie you're spending your night with is still sleeping peacefully.
In the other beds, the other travellers seem to be enjoying their rest too. Everything looks calm.
narrator.wake_up_30:
Yet you still feel the stress. The images come back to you:
The demon wars, the Absolut, fighting, death... your heart burning and almost consuming you whole...
And what has been perhaps bothering you the most lately.
narrator.wake_up_40:
It was a clean breakup somehow, the cleanest you have ever had.
 Not that you have a lot of experience in the matter... but anyway, it still hurts as fuck.
 You look at the babe sleeping by your side.
The evening was great, but now that the hotness and the adrenaline have faded you feel your broken heart aching again.
